title: Suggest acid for rich/starchy dishes
description: If a rich, starchy, or fatty dish has no obvious acidic component, suggest adding an acidic finishing component (vinegar, citrus, fermented dairy).
suggestionTemplate: Consider adding an acid (lemon, a splash of vinegar, or a finishing yogurt) to brighten and balance the dish.

examples.note: Add a splash of red wine vinegar at the end or serve with quick-pickled onions.
